title: Whisky Connoisseur TastingMasterclass With Entertainment and 5 Course Morrocan Tapas For One (£24) or Two (£43) at Liberty Lounge (Up to 77% Off)
highlights:
• Held at Liberty Lounge
  • Sessions last up to 90 minutes
  • Six different Scotch whiskies
  • Class covers introduction, history, production, understanding and flavour appreciation
  • Conducted by whisky connoisseur Mark Thomson, who most recently worked on Class Magazine and Difford's Guide
  • Five course Moroccan tapas is included
  • Suitable for novices and devotees

title: Filmmaking Course for £39 at Raindance Film School (Value £119)
highlights:
• Day long course of four 90 minute sessions
  • Learn the skills of screenwriting, directing and filmmaking
  • Led by experienced industry experts
  • Networking opportunity afterwards to meet like-minded individuals
  • Refreshments provided (excludes lunch)
